description: Associates the selected software bill of materials (SBOM) with a specific software package version. Requires permission to access the AssociateSbomWithPackageVersion action.

parameters.name: packageName
parameters.description: The name of the new software package.

parameters.name: versionName
parameters.description: The name of the new package version.

parameters.name: sbom
parameters.description: A specific software bill of matrerials associated with a software package version. s3Location (dict) --- The S3 location. bucket (string) --- The S3 bucket. key (string) --- The S3 key. version (string) --- The S3 bucket version.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: packageName
nested_items.description: The name of the new software package.

nested_items.name: versionName
nested_items.description: The name of the new package version.

nested_items.name: sbomValidationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the initial validation for the software bill of materials against the Software Package Data Exchange (SPDX) and CycloneDX industry standard formats.
